Turns out I had to change my request.  No Raine in a Body style line up since according to Tom there's a bit of a running gag in development of her being clothed even in Keidran form.  Tom apologized for that though. Turns out he likes doing line ups even
Though they're a lot of work.
Plus if you look at it, both Adria and Raine have about the same body style (although granted Raine is not as fluffy as Adira).
And since the body style line ups are for different characters it really wouldn't make since to have another character with the same body style to appear.
Yeah he likes doing them but they're a lot of work though.  So....

I opted to do a request of poor Keith finding himself in bed with Adelaide and Natani and wondering how the heck did this happen!  Also I saw in a name generator for D&D 5th edition sourcebook, Adeladie's name appears under the name list for Female

there's no actual quality items in it, people buy them so stores don't drop the costs of it
